name: Smallest Dungeon
description:
Smallest Dungeon is an automated, fast paced dungeon crawler, with only a single room, but tons of enemies. Lead a group of four adventurers as endless monster waves spawn in the Room of Doom.

Your characters will attack and move automatically, all you have to do is trigger their special powers, heal them, and most importantly, choose their loot to create your own build and hope to exit that doomed room!

Each game is different. There are 30 loot items to collect, 10 enemies to defeat, 4 songs to listen to, and some hidden stuff too!

Controls :
- Keyboard : 1,2,3,4 : hero powers and loot choices, 5 : potions
- XBox gamepad : A,B,X,Y : hero powers and loot choices, RT : potions
- Mouse : click on the hero powers and potions to use them, click on the loot cards to pick them.

Credits :
All code, visuals and illustrations done in 72 hours by Renaud Forestié.
Music by my band, Uniform Motion.

Special thanks to Andy and Olivier, I probably would have given up without you guys. And thanks to the nice people at Motion Twin for having me for the weekend.
